properties.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 8 at 5:04AM AKST until January 10 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible.

* WHERE...Portions of the eastern gulf coast and the central
Panhandle, including Wrangell, Petersburg, Kake, and Port
Alexander. Heavy snow is not likely for Sitka.

* WHEN...Thursday night through Friday morning.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow could persist through Friday
afternoon. Accumulations of 4 to 9 inches is possible.
properties.instruction:
A watch means conditions are favorable of the development winter
storm conditions in and close to the watch area.

Preparation for this potentially dangerous weather event should
begin now.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING
